com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IQueryService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryService
public interface IQueryService
extends IService

The interface for the QueryService class The QueryService class provides services to run general node search queries of the database.

Method Detail

searchNode

java.util.Vector searchNode(PCSession session,
                            java.lang.String sContextCondition,
                            java.lang.String sViewID,
                            java.util.Vector vtSelectedNodeTypes,
                            java.util.Vector vtSelectedAuthors,
                            java.util.Vector vtSelectedCodes,
                            int sMatchCodesCondition,
                            java.util.Vector vKeywords,
                            int nMatchKeywordCondition,
                            java.util.Vector attrib,
                            java.util.Date dBeforeCreationDate,
                            java.util.Date dAfterCreationDate,
                            java.util.Date dBeforeModificationDate,
                            java.util.Date dAfterModificationDate)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a Vector of nodes given a keyword

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sContextCondition, context of the search (just the given view, all views, deleted views)
String - sViewID, the id of the curernt view.
Vector - vtSelectedNodeTypes, a vector of the selected node type to run the search against.
Vector - vtSelectedAuthors, a vector of author to run the search against.
Vector - vtSelectedCodes, a vector of codes to run the search against.
Vector - vKeywords, a vector of keywords to run the search against.
int - nMatchKeywordCondition, match all or any keywords.
Vector - attrib, match the keywords in the label, detail or both as specified.
java.util.Date - beforeCreationDate, the end creation date to run the search against.
java.util.Date - afterCreationDate, the start creation date to run the search against.
java.util.Date - beforeModificationDate, the end modification date to run the search against.
java.util.Date - afterModificationDate, the start modification date to run the search against.
Returns:
Vector, of NodeSummary objects resulting from executing the search.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

searchExactNodeLabel

java.util.Vector searchExactNodeLabel(PCSession session,
                                      java.lang.String sText,
                                      int nType)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Return all nodes whose labels match exactly the given text.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sText, the text to match node label to.
int - nType, the node type to confine the match to.
Returns:
Vector, of NodeSummary objects resultant from the search.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

searchExactNodeLabelInView

java.util.Vector searchExactNodeLabelInView(PCSession session,
                                            java.lang.String sText,
                                            int nType,
                                            java.lang.String sViewID)
                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
Return all nodes whose labels EQUAL the passed text and are in the given view.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sText, - the text to match.
nType, - the type of the node to filter the search on.
sViewID, - the id of the view to search in.
Returns:
Vector, of NodePosition objects whose label matches the given text.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

searchTransclusions

java.util.Vector searchTransclusions(PCSession session,
                                     java.lang.String text,
                                     java.lang.String nodeid,
                                     int type)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Return all nodes whose labels start with the passed text, and are of the passed node type, but are not the given node.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sText, the text to match to the start of node labels.
String - sNodeID, the node to exclude from the results.
int - nType, the node type to confine the match to.
Returns:
Vector, of NodeSummary objects resultant from the search.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
